short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent your tab to be closed or reloaded

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent a tab from being closed closed or reloaded. Just right click anywhere on the page and select "Lock tab" from the menu. Also useful when debugging javascript and want to prevent unwanted reloads.
